sys_script.name: sp_global_certificate_create_rule

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_e0884aff1b007c102369eb1cad4bcbc7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item=13ee3e2b1bccf8102369eb1cad4bcbd9^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="SP_GLOBAL_CREATE_CERTIFICATE" endquery="false" field="cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="13ee3e2b1bccf8102369eb1cad4bcbd9"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>sp_global_certificate_create_rule</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();	
	r.setEndpoint("https://appdemo.appviewx.plus/avxapi/acctmgmt-perform-login?gwkey=f00ca01&gwsource=external");
	r.setHttpMethod("post");
	r.setRequestHeader("username", "nousheef.c");
	r.setRequestHeader("password", "Noushi123!@#");
	r.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
	r.setRequestBody('{\"payload\":{\n}\n}');
    r.setHttpTimeout(10000);
	var response = r.execute();
	var error = response.getErrorMessage();
	var responseBody = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
	var req_itm_num;
	var sessionid = responseBody["response"]['sessionId'];
	var certificate_description = "Certificate Creation Through SNOW Incident";
	var certificate_authority, application_name, key_type, certificate_type_internal, 
		business_unit, group_email_id, bit_length, customer_contact_number, customer_Name, server_name,
        customer_email, comments,cost_center, validity_in_years, subject_alternative_names, certificate_category,
		certificate_type_external, hash_function, certificate_group,csr_text, common_name;
	var inc = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
		inc.query();
		while(inc.next())
		{
			req_itm_num = inc.number;
			certificate_authority = inc.hierarchical_variables.certificate_authority;
			application_name = inc.hierarchical_variables.application_name;
            key_type = inc.hierarchical_variables.key_type;
			certificate_type_internal = inc.hierarchical_variables.certificate_type_internal;
			business_unit = inc.hierarchical_variables.business_unit;
			group_email_id = inc.hierarchical_variables.group_email_id;
			bit_length = inc.hierarchical_variables.bit_length;
			customer_contact_number = inc.hierarchical_variables.customer_contact_number;
			customer_Name = inc.hierarchical_variables.Customer_Name;
			server_name = inc.hierarchical_variables.server_name;
			customer_email = inc.hierarchical_variables.customer_email;
			comments = inc.hierarchical_variables.comments;
			cost_center = inc.hierarchical_variables.cost_center;
			validity_in_years = inc.hierarchical_variables.validity_in_years;
			subject_alternative_names = inc.hierarchical_variables.subject_alternative_names;
			certificate_category = inc.hierarchical_variables.certificate_category;
			certificate_type_external = inc.hierarchical_variables.certificate_type_external;
			hash_function = inc.hierarchical_variables.hash_function;
			certificate_group = inc.hierarchical_variables.certificate_group;
			csr_text = inc.hierarchical_variables.csr_text;
			common_name = inc.hierarchical_variables.common_name;
		}
    var payload = "{\"payload\": {\"header\": {\"workflowName\": \"SP Global Create Certificate\"}, \"data\": {\"input\": {\"requestData\": [{\"scenario\": \"scenario\",\"sequenceNo\": 1, \"fieldInfo\": {\"req_itm_num\":\""+ req_itm_num +"\", \"server_name\":\""+ server_name +"\", \"key_type\":\""+ key_type +"\", \"san_internal_wildcard\":\""+ certificate_category +"\", \"cert_type_external\":\""+ certificate_type_external +"\", \"wildcard\":\""+ certificate_description +"\", \"application_name\":\""+ application_name +"\", \"group_email_id\":\""+ group_email_id +"\", \"cert_group\":\""+ certificate_group +"\", \"common_name\":\""+ common_name +"\", \"san\":\""+ subject_alternative_names +"\", \"comments\":\""+ comments +"\", \"cert_type_internal\":\""+ certificate_type_internal +"\", \"bit_length\":\""+ bit_length +"\", \"customer_contact\":\""+ customer_contact_number +"\", \"cert_category\":\""+ certificate_category +"\", \"cost_center\":\""+ cost_center +"\", \"customer_email\":\""+ customer_email +"\", \"customer_name\":\""+ customer_Name +"\", \"ca_type\":\""+ certificate_authority +"\", \"validity\":\""+ validity_in_years +"\", \"hash\":\""+ hash_function +"\", \"business_unit\":\""+ business_unit +"\", \"csr_file\":\""+ csr_text +"\"}}]}, \"task_action\": 1}}}";
	var r1 = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	r1.setEndpoint("https://appdemo.appviewx.plus/avxapi/visualworkflow-submit-request?gwkey=f00ca01 &gwsource=external");
	r1.setRequestHeader("SessionId", sessionid);
	r1.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
	r1.setHttpMethod("post");
	r1.setRequestBody(payload);
	r1.setHttpTimeout(10000);
	var response1 = r1.execute();
	var responseBody1 = JSON.parse(response1.getBody());
	var avx_id = responseBody1["response"]["requestId"];
	current.description = resp1;
	previous.description = resp1;
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-18 01:08:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e0884aff1b007c102369eb1cad4bcbc7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sp_global_certificate_create_rule</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AppViewX Automation+" source="x_avx_appviewx_aut">7165e2f81bc808502369eb1cad4bcbe0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="AppViewX Automation+">7165e2f81bc808502369eb1cad4bcbe0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e0884aff1b007c102369eb1cad4bcbc7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-21 13:47:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>
